text: V pritchakh i istoriyakh vashikh predkov - nazidaniye dlya vas, chtoby vy uverovali. My poslali Nukha k yego narodu, i on skazal im: "O narod moy! Poklonyaytes' Allakhu Yedinomu. Ved' u vas net drugogo boga, krome Nego, kotoryy zasluzhivayet pokloneniya. Neuzheli vy ne boites' Yego nakazaniya i gibeli blag, yesli vy oslushayetes'
